{{CustomTabs|tab1=Overview|tab2=Reaction|tab3=Enemy|tab4=Weapon|tab5=Character|tab6=Talents}}
These data are just for complex calculations. For data in brief, see [[Weapons/Base Attack Scaling]] and [[Weapons/Sub Stat Scaling]]

The main stat values of weapons are determined by '''base values''', '''level multipliers''' and '''ascension values'''.

The sub stat values of weapons are determined by '''base values''' and '''the level multiplier'''.

Values in tables are rounded, but the actual values used in the game are decimals with more digits, so using these values to calculate will often result in some small rounding error.

==Main Stat==
For calculations,

'''Main Stat Value = Base Value * Level Multiplier + Ascension Value'''

===Base Value===
Different base values will use different level multipliers.
*[[Sword of Descension]] is a special weapon. Although it is a 4-Star weapon and uses the 4-Star ascension value, it actually uses 38.7 as the base value and the 3-Star Tier 2 Multiplier as the level multiplier.

===Level Multiplier===
For 1–3-Star weapons, they use the same set of level multipliers.

For 4-Star or 5-Star weapons, they use two different sets of level multipliers.

For each set of level multipliers, there are three tiers.

The level multiplier changes per 5 levels of the weapon.
